name: Kraft Heinz Company
headquarters: Chicago, United States; Pittsburgh, United States
summary: The Kraft Heinz Company, formed in 2015 by the merger of Kraft Foods Group and H.J. Heinz Company, is one of the world’s largest food and beverage companies, with a portfolio of iconic brands such as Kraft, Heinz, Oscar Mayer, and Philadelphia. Headquartered in both Chicago and Pittsburgh, Kraft Heinz operates globally and serves more than 190 countries, generating over $26 billion in annual sales. The company is publicly traded under the ticker KHC and is known for its diverse range of grocery and food processing products.
